snippet: The best accessories for fall — soft briefcases, tone-on-tone watches and dress boots — take their cues from classic banker style. Paired with an offbeat pinstripe suit, they’re anything but conformist.
lead_paragraph: The best accessories for fall — soft briefcases, tone-on-tone watches and dress boots — take their cues from classic banker style. Paired with an offbeat pinstripe suit, they’re anything but conformist.

headline.main: Establishment Accessories That Go Against the Grain
